duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations.
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Private Sanctum](/Spells.aspx?ID=235)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 360 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Bastet](/Deities.aspx?ID=50), [Count Ranalc](/Deities.aspx?ID=92), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=44)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Area** 100-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>

</column>

---

From outside, the area looks like a bank of impenetrable black fog. Sensory stimuli (such as sounds, smells, and light) don't pass from inside the area to outside the area. Scrying spells can't perceive any stimuli from the area, and mind-reading effects don't work in the area.
name: Private Sanctum
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 360 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Bastet](/Deities.aspx?ID=50), [Count Ranalc](/Deities.aspx?ID=92), [Nivi Rhombodazzle](/Deities.aspx?ID=44)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>10 minutes ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Area** 100-foot burst

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations.
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Black fog prevents sensing, scrying, and mind-reading on anyone within.
</summary>
summary: Black fog prevents sensing, scrying, and mind-reading on anyone within.
summary_markdown: Black fog prevents sensing, scrying, and mind-reading on anyone within.
text: Private Sanctum Source Core Rulebook pg. 360 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Bastet, Count Ranalc, Nivi Rhombodazzle Cast 10 minutes (material, somatic, verbal) Range touch Area 100-foot burst Duration until the next time you make your daily preparations. --- From outside, the area looks like a bank of impenetrable black fog. Sensory stimuli (such as sounds, smells, and light) don't pass from inside the area to outside the area. Scrying spells can't perceive any stimuli from the area, and mind-reading effects don't work in the area.
